attributes.description: For my I&S Corporations Investigation Project, I have created a Annotated map about where and how the Vans (Classics) are created before it is sold into people's hands.
attributes.title: Vans Classic shoes

attributes.description:
Same as Thailand, Philippines is another well-known country for their production of Vulcanized rubber.
The Vans has not clearly stated that their properties are made from these places.

http://cool.conservation-us.org/jaic/img/jaic42-02-010-ch10fg12.jpg
attributes.title: Vulcanized rubber 2

attributes.description: Thailand is a place well-known for producing Vulcanized rubber for car tires and Vans shoes.
attributes.title: Vulcanized rubber place
Vans Headquarter
attributes.description:
In US Cypress, California where the Headquarters are located, the sketch and the designing part is all created in here. Also, other works such as Information technology, Marketing, Sale development and plans, International Business, Maintenance, and Logistics.

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/34/Vans-hq-01.jpg

attributes.title: Vans Factory 1
attributes.description: In March 1966, Vans has manufactured their first factory in Anaheim. Vans classics are mostly made from Canvas which are easy to obtain.

attributes.title: Factory 2
attributes.description:
Just like many other corporations around the world, Vans has also manufactured a sweatshop in China. Currently, Vans has not established code of conducts and the information about the woking facilities in China because, they have decided to keep it as their top secret.

Some sources indicates that they have factories in China, but the official Vans is confessing that it is all rooted and created in America.

http://www.the-house.com/portal/vans-history/

attributes.title: Vans Headquarter to Factory 2
attributes.description: The basic materials and methods of creating a VANS Classic shoes are sent by transportation

attributes.title: Vulcanized rubber place to Vulcanized rubber 2
